It's getting there, but what we do know is that we're taking pre-orders for this amazing shirt.

Share a Cup with Me.

OpenCoffee Club is a regular, open and informal meeting place for people involved in startups to meet.

The key is a regular place and a regular time - it's not important who comes along, some days it might be no one - just that people know if they want to meet, this is the time and this is the place.

The Concert Tee

You can put image / video embed in the column to the right. If you like, you can also swap the columns, which means this text column will be on the right hand side, while the image column is on the left. While on this column, you may want to put some description paragraphs or a nice list like below:

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
  • Sed feugiat arcu ut orci porta, eget porttitor felis suscipit.
  • Sed a nisl ullamcorper, tempus augue at, rutrum lacus. Duis et turpis eros.

Frequently Asked Questions

Local speakers

Listen to our community leaders and get to know our North Texas tech community. There's more of us than you'd think.

Food (Truck)

Oh yes, there will be tacos. Harvest House just opened a brand new food truck for you to stress test.

Free Drinks

Hungry for knowledge, but thirsty for beer? The first drink is on us! Sponsored by TruCrowd and DrawAttention.

Shops and Freelancers

Our city is home to world-renowned creative tech talent. Mingle & talk with local creatives and agencies in the area.

Screen printing

Shirts you say? Pan Ector will set up shop printing Denton tech shirts! Bootstrap Denton, Open Coffee Club, TechMill, etc.

Live Streaming

Periscope, Meerkat? Doesn't matter, we'll have something running for those of you unable to make it out.

Contact Us

Having second thoughts about a shirt?

Buy one today

Open Coffee Club is a bi-weekly meetup held all over the world where the startup and tech community comes together over a cup of coffee to talk about what's going on in the world.
